title: Trump On Drugs? The Great Bachelor Backtrack 3.6.18
itunes:title: Trump On Drugs? The Great Bachelor Backtrack 3.6.18
description:
In episode 98 Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Brandie Posey to discuss Sam Nunberg's meltdown, Mitt Romney, Christoper Steele, Rex Tillerson, Trump and his history with drugs, The Bachelor finale recap with super producer Anna, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
